name: 黃希敏
objective:
本課程涵蓋:
文法、字彙、言談分析、語用學、語料庫語言學、第二語言/外語習得、心理語言學、社會語言學、學習者的方式、策略、動機等，並著重外語教學法（聽、說、讀、寫、評量）的研究與實踐。
schedule:
01  Introduction
02  An Overview of Applied Linguistics
03  Grammar
04  Vocabulary
05  Discourse Analysis
06  Pragmatics
07  Corpus Linguistics
08  INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE (APPLINX)
09  Second Language Acquisition
10  Psycholinguistics
11  Sociolinguistics
12  Focus on the Language Learner: Styles, Strategies and Motivation
13  Listening
14  Speaking and Pronunciation
15  Reading
16  Writing
17  Assessment
18  TERM PAPER Submission
scorePolicy:
1. Class participation  50%
2. Individual presentation  20%
3. Term Paper  30%
materials:
Textbook
Schmitt, Norbert (2010). Applied Linguistics. UK & USA: Hodder Education
Reference Book
Heigham and Croker (2009). Qualitative Research in Applied Linguistics. UK & USA: Palgrave Macmillan
